title: Agentuity Project Schema
description: The schema for an Agentuity project

version.description: The version semver range required to run this project

project_id.description: The ID of the project which is automatically generated

name.description: The name of the project which is editable

description.description: The description of the project which is editable

port.description: The port to run the development server on which can be overridden by setting the PORT environment variable

enabled.description: Whether to watch for changes and automatically restart the server

files.description: Rules for files to watch for changes

command.description: The command to run the development server

args.description: The arguments to pass to the development server

command.description: The command to run in the cloud deployment

args.description: The arguments to pass to the command when running in the cloud deployment

memory.description: The memory requirements expressed in bytes. 1GB is is represented as 1Gi

cpu.description: The CPU requirements expressed in millicores. 1 CPU unit is 1000 millicores or 1000m

disk.description: The disk size requirements expressed in bytes. 1GB is is represented as 1Gi

enabled.description: Whether bundling is enabled for this provider

dir.description: The directory location where the agents are located

id.description: The ID of the Agent which is automatically generated

name.description: The name of the Agent which is editable

description.description: The description of the Agent which is editable

agents.description: The agents that are part of this project
